original_title: Girls Kissing Girls 3: Make Up, Makeout Sessions
overview: Long lost friends Michelle Lay and Puma Swede re-connect in the most delicious of ways, while brunette Zoe Britton uses her lovely lips to win back heartbroken blonde Darryl Hannah. Blonde icon Nina Hartley comforts young dark haired Mina Meow after getting some disappointing news while brunette goddess Nakita Denise makes a last ditch effort to change icy blonde Samantha Ryan's mind.
title: Girls Kissing Girls 3: Make Up, Makeout Sessions
